summary: The U.S. Patent and Trademark Office's Patent Trial and Appeal Board was formed in 2012 as an alternative to federal courts for patent disputes. There is the potential for political-appointee office directors to influence judicial decisions. title: Patent Trial and Appeal Board: Increased Transparency Needed in Oversight of Judicial Decision-Making
